title: Lamb of God Announce 2025 Headbangers Boat Cruise: Clutch, Obituary, and DevilDriver
description: The metal cruise will also feature Kublai Khan TX, Fear Factory, The Black Dahlia Murder, Crowbar, and other acts. Lamb of God Announce 2025 Headbangers Boat Cruise: Clutch, Obituary, and DevilDriver Spencer Kaufman
author: Spencer Kaufman
excerpt: Lamb of God have announced the 2025 edition of their Headbangers Boat cruise, featuring Clutch, Obituary, DevilDriver, and more metal bands. Get full details.
text: The 2024 edition of Lamb of God’s Headbangers Boat cruise just returned to port, and the band didn’t waste any time announcing the 2025 edition, including the initial lineup. As always, Lamb of God will headline the cruise, with the 2025 lineup including Clutch, Obituary, DevilDriver, Kublai Khan TX, Fear Factory, The Black Dahlia Murder, Crowbar, Eighteen Visions, and BRAT. The 2025 edition will see the Norwegian Jewel sailing from Miami on October 31st, 2025, stopping at Cozumel, Mexico, and returning on November 4th. A pre-sale for Headbangers Boat alumni will be available November 11th-13th. After that, pre-sales are open to everyone on November 14th-15th and November 18th-19th. Finally, a public on-sale begins November 18th at 2 p.m. ET. All sales take place exclusively through the official Headbangers Boat website. In addition to the aforementioned acts, Lamb of God guitarist Mark Morton will perform a tribute to Lynyrd Skynyrd with solo band. The cruise will also feature standup comedy from Josh Potter and Saul Trujillo. The 2025 edition of Headbangers Boat will mark the third installment of the metal cruise. As mentioned, the 2024 version recently set sail, having departed Miami on October 28th and returned today (November 1st). See the initial lineup for Headbangers Boat 2025 in the poster below.
html:
The 2024 edition of Lamb of God’s Headbangers Boat cruise just returned to port, and the band didn’t waste any time announcing the 2025 edition, including the initial lineup.

As always, Lamb of God will headline the cruise, with the 2025 lineup including Clutch, Obituary, DevilDriver, Kublai Khan TX, Fear Factory, The Black Dahlia Murder, Crowbar, Eighteen Visions, and BRAT.

The 2025 edition will see the Norwegian Jewel sailing from Miami on October 31st, 2025, stopping at Cozumel, Mexico, and returning on November 4th.

A pre-sale for Headbangers Boat alumni will be available November 11th-13th. After that, pre-sales are open to everyone on November 14th-15th and November 18th-19th. Finally, a public on-sale begins November 18th at 2 p.m. ET. All sales take place exclusively through the official Headbangers Boat website.

In addition to the aforementioned acts, Lamb of God guitarist Mark Morton will perform a tribute to Lynyrd Skynyrd with solo band. The cruise will also feature standup comedy from Josh Potter and Saul Trujillo.

The 2025 edition of Headbangers Boat will mark the third installment of the metal cruise. As mentioned, the 2024 version recently set sail, having departed Miami on October 28th and returned today (November 1st).

See the initial lineup for Headbangers Boat 2025 in the poster below.
